price: چا چې لويي كړې هغوى به وايي: یقینا موږ ټول پكې يو، بېشكه الله د بندګانو ترمنځ پرېکړه كړې ده.
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُلّٞ فِيهَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ حَكَمَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā kullun fīhā inna al-laha qad ḥakama bayna al-ʿibādi
